resources.string: Please make sure to have saved your private key before logging out
The “active” authority is used to set the account name or public key that has the right to spend money of the account.
The “owner” authority is used to set controller of the account. The controller(account or public key) has the right to change issues related to the account, including authorization.
Private key is for recover wallet or reset wallet password, long press to copy, keep your private key safe
